creditline: Gift of Mrs. C. C. Bovey
description: towel end, loosely woven linen in two strips joined vertically, embroidered with a design of two motives enclosed in an octagon shape which contains a basket and geometric flowers and leaves; the octagon is in turn surrounded by a group of stiffly drawn flowers; there is a narrow border of stiff red and yellow flowers across the bottom; blue, red and tan colors predominate
title: Towel end
